description: A cozy and comfortable single room with a city view, ideal for solo travelers. This room includes modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a mini-bar. Room size is approximately 20 square meters. The room has a rating of 4.5 stars and features a single bed for your convenience.

A spacious and inviting double room with a garden view, perfect for couples or friends. This room offers free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a mini-bar. With a room size of around 30 square meters, it has a high rating of 4.7 stars and features one comfortable double bed.

Experience luxury in our deluxe suite with a private balcony and stunning ocean views. This spacious suite offers free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar, and ocean view. With a room size of 50 square meters, it boasts an impressive rating of 4.9 stars and features two comfortable beds.

Indulge in an elegant room with a king-size bed and mesmerizing city skyline views. This room offers free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a mini-bar. With a room size of around 40 square meters, it maintains a rating of 4.6 stars and features one plush king-size bed.

Our family suite is perfect for larger groups, featuring a spacious living area and modern amenities, including a kitchenette. The suite is 70 square meters in size and boasts a high rating of 4.8 stars, accommodating up to three beds.

Experience the epitome of luxury in our presidential suite, featuring a private Jacuzzi and panoramic city views. This expansive suite is 100 square meters in size and holds a perfect rating of 5.0 stars. It offers one luxurious king-size bed.
